Room.Name: Granovetter's Corner
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the tree-lined yard in front of Hans Granovetter's Inn.
Room.LongDescription: the large old inn was hand-built by Granovetter the dwarf and his wife more than a century ago. They carried river stones from the Ramdes River which is a little way further east of here. The newer buildings were built by their sons and daughters as the family grew, and now there is a thriving little village starting to spread out near this bend in the North Highway.
